pageSetting.title: 机构考核得分查询

attribute.value: select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='1'

select distinct jglb.lbdh as key,jglb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='1' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select yyjg.tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc,jglb.lbdh,jglb.lbmc, jg.khdxdh, khfa.fabh, khfa.famc, yyjg.yyjg from ( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, sum(yyjg) yyjg ,sum(zbz) zbz,sum(jhz) jhz from( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg ,zbz,jhz from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg where 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$ /* union all select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg from sgdr_yyjg_jg where tjrq=$tjrq$ and khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) */ ) t group by tjrq, fabh, khdxdh ) yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qx($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$ , 0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh where khfa.yyzlbh=2 and jglb.lbdh='$jglb$' order by khfa.fabh desc,yyjg.yyjg desc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select yyjg.tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc,jglb.lbdh,jglb.lbmc, jg.khdxdh, khfa.fabh, khfa.famc, yyjg.yyjg from ( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, sum(yyjg) yyjg ,sum(zbz) zbz,sum(jhz) jhz from( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg ,zbz,jhz from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg where 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$ /* union all select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg from sgdr_yyjg_jg where tjrq=$tjrq$ and khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) */ ) t group by tjrq, fabh, khdxdh ) yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qx($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$ , 0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh where khfa.yyzlbh=2 and jglb.lbdh='$jglb$' order by khfa.fabh desc,yyjg.yyjg desc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='1'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct jglb.lbdh as key,jglb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='1' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$
